text: What 8-bit embedded platform have you used for a design?
I'm looking for an off-the-shelf 8-bit processor module or even an entire hardware platform you used in a design.
You used this product and essentially put your software on it.
If you could mention the processor type and vendor it would be great.
A small summary of the platform characteristics would also be great (e.g.
Think of this as an informal survey, so the actual capabilities of the platform don't really matter.
Edit: I'm really looking for off-the-shelf hardware modules, more than simply a processor.
Actual capabilities don't matter greatly, as this is more of a survey.
